text: Claude Evrard (29 July 1933 – 20 April 2020) was a French actor. He was born in Versailles, France. His best known roles were in Circus Angel, Le Distrait and If the Sun Never Returns. His last movie role was in the 2017 drama Back to Burgundy. He also starred in the 1990s television series Les Cinq Dernières Minutes. Evrard died on 20 April 2020 in Clamart, France at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:French television actors Category:French voice actors Category:People from Versailles
title: Claude Evrard
